Description: Flight into Egypt; the Virgin and Joseph, carrying the Christ Child, alighting from a boat, another figure at right rowing; illustration to Metz's 'Imitations of Ancient and Modern Drawings' (London: Metz, 1798). Etching and aquatint, printed in tones of brown
Producer name: Print made by: Conrad Martin Metz
Curator's comments: See 1855,0609.812 for comment. See 1946,0713.1494 for a drawing after Ferri on the BM collection.
Associated names: Associated with: Alleyne Fitzherbert, Baron St Helens
Associated titles: Imitations of Ancient and Modern Drawings from the restoration of the Arts in Italy to the present time
Acquisition name: Purchased from: A E Evans & Sons
